Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the automated storage and dispensing of controlled substances using an automated dispensing device
Summary: Relates to the automated storage and dispensing of controlled substances using an automated dispensing device at licensed nursing homes, residential health care facilities and hospices.
LawCode: Amd ยง6802, add ยง6809, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the automated storage and dispensing of controlled substances using an automated dispensing device
